name: play
description: Add a song to the queue

options.name: song
options.description: A link to the song you want the bot to play.

name: queue
description: See what tracks are queued up.

name: remove
description: Remove a song from the queue

options.name: index
options.description: The index of the song in the queue to remove

name: skip
description: Skip to the next song in the queue.
